Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@DLT Novice 
it is not about spv servers
it is about the seed creation and validation in agama
this exploit was found by others outside the team and they informed us
so they would have informed other teams too if their wallets are affected
so you can only follow the instructions given by the respective teams
or you could be safe and transfer them all to paper wallets/ hard ware wallets
KMD team confirmed Verus agama is safe so that can be used for the coins available on it
